meanings.sent1: The catena of events led to a happy ending.

meanings.definition: A series of related items or events
meanings.sent1: The catena of clues helped solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The catena of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent3: The catena of flavors in the dish surprised him.
meanings.sent4: Their catena of conversations flowed effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The catena of paintings in the gallery told a story.

meanings.definition: A chain of connected thoughts or ideas
meanings.sent1: His catena of arguments convinced the audience.
meanings.sent2: The catena of scientific theories puzzled the students.
meanings.sent3: The catena of dreams kept her awake at night.
meanings.sent4: Their catena of solutions impressed the judges.
